summary:
{
   "summary": ... 
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. Class AzureADOAuthProvider. Likely provides OAuth authentication with Azure Active Directory, handling token retrieval and user info. So summary: class handles OAuth flow for Azure AD, stores token and user info, provides accessors. Business intent: enable applications to authenticate users via Azure AD and retrieve user details. Keywords: Azure, Active Directory, OAuth, authentication, token, user info, provider, security, access token, identity.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. So avoid "get_token" etc. Use generic terms. Provide JSON.assistantfinal{
  "summary": "A provider that manages Azure Active Directory OAuth authentication, handling the acquisition and storage of access tokens and associated user profile data, and exposing convenient accessors for these credentials.",
  "business_intent": "To enable applications to authenticate users through Azure AD, obtain the necessary access token, and retrieve basic user information for authorization and personalization purposes.",
  "keywords": [
    "Azure",
    "Active Directory",
    "OAuth",
    "authentication",
    "access token",
    "user profile",
    "identity provider",
    "security",
    "credential management",
    "single sign‑on"
  ]
}
